name: Grapple Hearts
description:
** I recommend playing the game on Google Chrome or some other browser that isn't Microsoft Edge for better quality!**

Flirt with Monster Girls and swing through Dungeons for Treasure!

Controls:

-left-click to advance cut-scene dialogue.

-W A S D to move  in-game.

-Use the mouse aim to aim and turn. left click on the green points to shoot grapple

Updates Made:

-made grapple points round and larger to ease difficulty 

- textured level and modeled collectible treasure

Possible Future Updates:

-Add larger Dungeon to explore

-better sprites 

-music

-maybe more dialogue and other characters...
